problem.script: from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
problem.p: A thin rod of length D and mass M is at rest on a horizontal and frictionless table contained in the (x,y) plane. The rod is pivoted at one of its end. A small ball of mass M, traveling with a speed v perpendicular to the rod's axis collides and sticks to the other end of the rod. What is the rod's angular velocity after the collision? (Gravity is into the screen).

hintgroup.p: Hint: consider where should you put your axis.
